item.title: Shutdown Script For Asus WL-500W With Oleg Firmware
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: If you have an Asus WL-500W, the DIYers’ favourite wireless router, and have installed the Oleg custom firmware on it, then you would have set up a shutdown script for it, that allows your router to shut down gracefully. This is especially important if you have a USB hard disk attached to it. There are many such scripts available in Oleg’s firmware that you can tweak. All of these reside in “/usr/local/sbin/”.
